history.proof: induction ll as [| [y a] ll' IHll]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (eq_X_dec x y) as [eq | neq]. + reflexivity. + apply IHll.

ctx: induction ll as [| [y a] ll' IHll].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "x" in the current goal.

original: induction ll as [| [y a] ll' IHll]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (eq_X_dec x y) as [eq | neq]. + rewrite eq. reflexivity. + apply IHll.
